name: Deflecto (itch)
description:
An endless top-down action shooter(kind of) where you play as Deflecto, an entity with the power to deflect things and fight other versions of yourself with your own projectile. But beware, just because you can deflect it doesn't mean it won't hurt you, so make sure you are avoiding the enemies, but also your own.

Control the color wheel and survive as long as you can, trying to get the highest score, carefully hitting enemies with their own color. If you hit an enemy with an opposing color, the projectile will be redirected to where it came from, whilst if it's hit with the other colors, it will go straight through them.

Utilize these abilities and get the highest score in this endless, and make sure to leave a comment of your scores!

Controls
  • WASD to Move
  • Mouse to Aim
  • LMB to Deflect toward the mouse
  • RMB to Change projectile color
  • Careful when playing, the confined mode does not work properly so the mouse can still click outside the window unfortunately
Features
  • Smooth Top-Down controls
  • Physics-based projectile Deflection
  • Colored Projectile damages certain enemies
  • 2 Types of enemies(not implemented)

Programming, Art, SFX by: Bife13 - itch.io

Music by: Taiga | Kubbi (kubbimusic.com)

This was a short game made for the Mini Jam 111: Colors² with the Theme of "Colors" and the limitation of "You are your own enemy".
